trans-unit.source: Add Mobile Services to an existing app (iOS) | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Add Mobile Services to an existing app (iOS) | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to get started using Mobile Services to leverage data in your iOS app.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to get started using Mobile Services to leverage data in your iOS app.

trans-unit.source: Add Mobile Services to an existing app
trans-unit.target: Add Mobile Services to an existing app

trans-unit.source: In this tutorial, you download an existing app that stores data in-memory and change it to work with an Azure mobile service.
trans-unit.target: In this tutorial, you download an existing app that stores data in-memory and change it to work with an Azure mobile service.

trans-unit.source: Completing the [Quick Start] is a pre-requisite before starting this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: Completing the [Quick Start] is a pre-requisite before starting this tutorial.

trans-unit.source: You will re-use the mobile service you create in the Quick Start.
trans-unit.target: You will re-use the mobile service you create in the Quick Start.

trans-unit.source: Download GetStartedWithData Project
trans-unit.target: Download GetStartedWithData Project

trans-unit.source: This tutorial is built on the [GetStartedWithData iOS app].
trans-unit.target: This tutorial is built on the [GetStartedWithData iOS app].

trans-unit.source: The app is identical to [Quick Start], except that added items are stored in memory.
trans-unit.target: The app is identical to [Quick Start], except that added items are stored in memory.

trans-unit.source: Download the [GetStartedWithData iOS app].
trans-unit.target: Download the [GetStartedWithData iOS app].

trans-unit.source: In Xcode, open the project and examine **TodoService.m**.
trans-unit.target: In Xcode, open the project and examine **TodoService.m**.

trans-unit.source: There are eight **// TODO** comments that specify the steps to make this app work.
trans-unit.target: There are eight **// TODO** comments that specify the steps to make this app work.

trans-unit.source: Update App to Use Mobile Service for Data Access
trans-unit.target: Update App to Use Mobile Service for Data Access

trans-unit.source: Test App
trans-unit.target: Test App

trans-unit.source: In Xcode, click **Run** to start the app.
trans-unit.target: In Xcode, click **Run** to start the app.

trans-unit.source: Add items to the todo list by typing in text and clicking **+**.
trans-unit.target: Add items to the todo list by typing in text and clicking **+**.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, click **Mobile Services**, and then click your mobile service.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, click **Mobile Services**, and then click your mobile service.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Data** tab, then click **Browse**.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Data** tab, then click **Browse**.

trans-unit.source: Notice that the **TodoItem** table now contains data, with id values generated by Mobile Services, and that columns have been automatically added to the table to match the TodoItem class in the app.
trans-unit.target: Notice that the **TodoItem** table now contains data, with id values generated by Mobile Services, and that columns have been automatically added to the table to match the TodoItem class in the app.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
